articles.description: The Detroit Tigers scored twice in the seventh inning, thanks to a Twins error, to take the opener of this five-game set, 7-5, at Comerica Park.
articles.content: Detroit Tigers rookie Spencer Torkelson hit a grounder between first and second base with two outs in the seventh inning. Minnesota Twins first baseman Jose Miranda tracked down the ball, but his thr… [+7368 chars]

articles.author: Dom Luszczyszyn, Shayna Goldman
articles.title: 2022 NHL playoff preview: Avalanche vs. Oilers - The Athletic
articles.description: Nathan MacKinnon's Avalanche are favored, but the Oilers are peaking at the right time, led by Connor McDavid's incredible performance.
articles.content:
Connor McDavid versus Nathan MacKinnon.
Thats it. Thats the lede.
Thats the selling point of this series, a heavyweight tilt between two of the best players in the world, finally going toe-to-toe a… [+24312 chars]
